name: Kassien
content:
Kassien was a female Rattataki Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. A merchant, she sold armor to Sith Inquisitors on Vaiken Spacedock.
Lord Kassien appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP Warzone Gear Vendor for the Sith Inquisitor class on Vaiken Spacedock. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system. She came back in Game Update 5.1 as a Tier 2 Inquisitor Unassembled Tokens vendor.
